All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
DerivativeCalculator
This class provides methods to calculate the derivative of a given function using the finite difference method.
Layout
Layout is a custom JavaFX Group that organizes the UI components for the Plotter application.
PlotArea
PlotArea is a custom JavaFX Group that represents a 2D plotting area for mathematical functions.
PlotFunction
PlotFunction is a class for managing the graphical representation of a mathematical function.
Plotter
The Plotter class extends the JavaFX Application class and is responsible for creating and displaying the main application window.
ScrollPaneFunctionsElement
ScrollPaneFunctionsElement represents a single function element in the scroll pane, including a TextField for input, and buttons for derivative calculation, deletion, visibility.
ScrollPaneVariablesElement
ScrollPaneVariablesElement represents a single variable element in the scroll pane, including a TextField for input, and a button for deletion.
